Description: Small net-sinker made of beige steatite, roughly oval in section, the ends are rounded. Three grooves incised, two at the ends one roughly in the middle, and some parallel cuts next to two of the grooves. All three grooves are only visible on one side of the object, they are not circumferential. The surface is smooth.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), E12.6J, above Jebel
